verses.verse: ( Greetings from Paul and Sosthenes) ( ( 510 18:1-11 ; 540 1:1-2 )) Παῦλος <WG3972> Paulos Paul , κλητὸς <WG2822> klētos called [to be] ἀπόστολος <WG652> apostolos an apostle Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou of Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus διὰ <WG1223> dia by θελήματος <WG2307> thelēmatos [the] will Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God , καὶ <WG2532> kai and Σωσθένης <WG4988> Sōsthenēs Sosthenes , ὁ <WG3588> ho [our] ἀδελφὸς <WG80> adelphos brother

Τῇ <WG3588> Tē To the ἐκκλησίᾳ <WG1577> ekklēsia church τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God «τῇ <WG3588> tē - οὔσῃ <WG1510> ousē - ἐν <WG1722> en in Κορίνθῳ» <WG2882> Korinthō Corinth , «ἡγιασμένοις <WG37> hēgiasmenois [to those] sanctified ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ» <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus κλητοῖς <WG2822> klētois [and] called ἁγίοις <WG40> hagiois [to be] holy , σὺν <WG4862> syn together with πᾶσιν <WG3956> pasin all τοῖς <WG3588> tois those ἐπικαλουμένοις <WG1941> epikaloumenois [who] call on τὸ <WG3588> to the ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma name τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ , ἐν <WG1722> en vvv παντὶ <WG3956> panti vvv τόπῳ <WG5117> topō everywhere αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn their [Lord] καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn ours :

Χάρις <WG5485> Charis Grace ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin to you καὶ <WG2532> kai and εἰρήνη <WG1515> eirēnē peace ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God Πατρὸς <WG3962> Patros Father ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our καὶ <WG2532> kai and Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou [the] Lord Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ .

( Thanksgiving) ( ( 570 1:3-11 ; 580 1:3-14 )) Εὐχαριστῶ <WG2168> Eucharistō I always thank τῷ <WG3588> tō - Θεῷ <WG2316> Theō God ‹μου› <WG1473> mou my πάντοτε <WG3842> pantote . . . περὶ <WG4012> peri for ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi because of τῇ <WG3588> tē the χάριτι <WG5485> chariti grace τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou [He] τῇ <WG3588> tē - δοθείσῃ <WG1325> dotheisē has given ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus .

ὅτι <WG3754> hoti For ἐν <WG1722> en in παντὶ <WG3956> panti every way , ἐπλουτίσθητε <WG4148> eploutisthēte you have been enriched ἐν <WG1722> en in αὐτῷ <WG846> autō Him ἐν <WG1722> en in παντὶ <WG3956> panti all λόγῳ <WG3056> logō speech καὶ <WG2532> kai and πάσῃ <WG3956> pasē all γνώσει <WG1108> gnōsei knowledge ,

καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs because τὸ <WG3588> to [our] μαρτύριον <WG3142> martyrion testimony τοῦ <WG3588> tou about Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ ἐβεβαιώθη <WG950> ebebaiōthē was confirmed ἐν <WG1722> en in ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you .

ὥστε <WG5620> hōste Therefore ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv ὑστερεῖσθαι <WG5302> hystereisthai do not lack ἐν <WG1722> en . . . μηδενὶ <WG3367> mēdeni [any] χαρίσματι <WG5486> charismati spiritual gift ἀπεκδεχομένους <WG553> apekdechomenous as you eagerly await τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ἀποκάλυψιν <WG602> apokalypsin revelation τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ .

ὃς <WG3739> hos [He] καὶ <WG2532> kai - βεβαιώσει <WG950> bebaiōsei will sustain ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you ἕως <WG2193> heōs to τέλους <WG5056> telous [the] end , ἀνεγκλήτους <WG410> anenklētous [so that you will be] blameless ἐν <WG1722> en on τῇ <WG3588> tē the ἡμέρᾳ <WG2250> hēmera day τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ .

πιστὸς <WG4103> pistos [is] faithful . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God , δι’ <WG1223> di’ - οὗ <WG3739> hou who ἐκλήθητε <WG2564> eklēthēte has called you εἰς <WG1519> eis into κοινωνίαν <WG2842> koinōnian fellowship τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Υἱοῦ <WG5207> Huiou Son αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou with His Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord , ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn our

Παρακαλῶ <WG3870> Parakalō I appeal ( Unity in the Church) δὲ <WG1161> de - ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas to you , ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers , διὰ <WG1223> dia in τοῦ <WG3588> tou the ὀνόματος <WG3686> onomatos name τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou Lord ἡμῶν <WG1473> hēmōn of our Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ , ἵνα <WG2443> hina that τὸ <WG3588> to . . . αὐτὸ <WG846> auto . . . , λέγητε <WG3004> legēte you agree together πάντες <WG3956> pantes all of καὶ <WG2532> kai [so that] μὴ <WG3361> mē no ᾖ <WG1510> ē there may be ἐν <WG1722> en among ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you σχίσματα <WG4978> schismata divisions ἦτε <WG1510> ēte you may be δὲ <WG1161> de and [that] κατηρτισμένοι <WG2675> katērtismenoi united ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō - αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - νοῒ <WG3563> noi mind καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐν <WG1722> en - τῇ <WG3588> tē - αὐτῇ <WG846> autē - γνώμῃ <WG1106> gnōmē conviction .

ἐδηλώθη <WG1213> edēlōthē have informed γάρ <WG1063> gar - μοι <WG1473> moi me περὶ <WG4012> peri - ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn - ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi brothers , μου <WG1473> mou My ὑπὸ <WG5259> hypo - τῶν <WG3588> tōn some Χλόης <WG5514> Chloēs from Chloe’s household ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that ἔριδες <WG2054> erides quarrels ἐν <WG1722> en among ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you . εἰσιν <WG1510> eisin there are

λέγω <WG3004> legō What I mean δὲ <WG1161> de - τοῦτο <WG3778> touto [is] this : ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - ἕκαστος <WG1538> hekastos Individuals ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn among you λέγει <WG3004> legei are saying , Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I μέν <WG3303> men - εἰμι <WG1510> eimi [follow] Παύλου <WG3972> Paulou Paul , ” Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I δὲ <WG1161> de - Ἀπολλῶ <WG625> Apollō [follow] Apollos , ” Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I δὲ <WG1161> de - Κηφᾶ <WG2786> Kēpha [follow] Cephas ,” ( That is, Peter) Ἐγὼ <WG1473> Egō “ I δὲ <WG1161> de [or] Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou [follow] Christ . ”

Μεμέρισται <WG3307> Memeristai divided ? ὁ <WG3588> ho - Χριστός <WG5547> Christos Is Christ μὴ <WG3361> mē vvv Παῦλος <WG3972> Paulos Was Paul ἐσταυρώθη <WG4717> estaurōthē crucified ὑπὲρ <WG5228> hyper for ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn you ? ἢ <WG2228> ē - εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸ <WG3588> to the ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma name Παύλου <WG3972> Paulou of Paul ? ἐβαπτίσθητε <WG907> ebaptisthēte Were you baptized

εὐχαριστῶ <WG2168> eucharistō I thank [τῷ <WG3588> tō - θεῷ] <WG2316> theō God ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that οὐδένα <WG3762> oudena . . . ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn of you ἐβάπτισα <WG907> ebaptisa I did not baptize any εἰ <WG1487> ei except μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . Κρίσπον <WG2921> Krispon Crispus καὶ <WG2532> kai and Γάϊον <WG1050> Gaion Gaius ,

ἵνα <WG2443> hina so μή <WG3361> mē no τις <WG5100> tis one εἴπῃ <WG2036> eipē can say ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὸ <WG3588> to - ἐμὸν <WG1699> emon my ὄνομα <WG3686> onoma name . ἐβαπτίσθητε <WG907> ebaptisthēte you were baptized

ἐβάπτισα <WG907> ebaptisa I also baptized δὲ <WG1161> de Yes , καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv τὸν <WG3588> ton the Στεφανᾶ <WG4734> Stephana of Stephanas ; οἶκον <WG3624> oikon household λοιπὸν <WG3063> loipon beyond that οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv οἶδα <WG1492> oida I do not remember εἴ <WG1487> ei if τινα <WG5100> tina anyone ἄλλον <WG243> allon else . ἐβάπτισα <WG907> ebaptisa I baptized

οὐ <WG3756> ou did not γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἀπέστειλέν <WG649> apesteilen send με <WG1473> me me Χριστὸς <WG5547> Christos Christ βαπτίζειν <WG907> baptizein to baptize , ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but εὐαγγελίζεσθαι <WG2097> euangelizesthai to preach the gospel , οὐκ <WG3756> ouk not ἐν <WG1722> en with σοφίᾳ <WG4678> sophia of wisdom , λόγου <WG3056> logou words ἵνα <WG2443> hina lest μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . κενωθῇ <WG2758> kenōthē be emptied of [its] power . ὁ <WG3588> ho the σταυρὸς <WG4716> stauros cross τοῦ <WG3588> tou of Χριστοῦ <WG5547> Christou Christ

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho the λόγος <WG3056> logos message ( The Message of the Cross) γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ὁ <WG3588> ho - τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the σταυροῦ <WG4716> staurou cross τοῖς <WG3588> tois to those who μὲν <WG3303> men - ἀπολλυμένοις <WG622> apollymenois are perishing , μωρία <WG3472> mōria foolishness ἐστίν <WG1510> estin is τοῖς <WG3588> tois - δὲ <WG1161> de but σῳζομένοις <WG4982> sōzomenois are being saved ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin to us who δύναμις <WG1411> dynamis [the] power Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God . ἐστιν <WG1510> estin it is

γέγραπται <WG1125> gegraptai it is written : γάρ <WG1063> gar For Ἀπολῶ <WG622> Apolō “ I will destroy τὴν <WG3588> tēn the σοφίαν <WG4678> sophian wisdom τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the σοφῶν <WG4680> sophōn wise ; καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὴν <WG3588> tēn the σύνεσιν <WG4907> synesin intelligence τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the συνετῶν <WG4908> synetōn intelligent ἀθετήσω <WG114> athetēsō I will frustrate .” ( (see also LXX))

Ποῦ <WG4226> Pou Where [is the] σοφός <WG4680> sophos wise [man] ? ποῦ <WG4226> pou Where [is] γραμματεύς <WG1122> grammateus [the] scribe ? ποῦ <WG4226> pou Where [is] συζητητὴς <WG4804> syzētētēs [the] philosopher τοῦ <WG3588> tou - αἰῶνος <WG165> aiōnos age ? τούτου <WG3778> toutou of this οὐχὶ <WG3780> ouchi Has not ἐμώρανεν <WG3471> emōranen made foolish ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God τὴν <WG3588> tēn the σοφίαν <WG4678> sophian wisdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world ?

ἐπειδὴ <WG1894> epeidē since γὰρ <WG1063> gar For ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē the σοφίᾳ <WG4678> sophia wisdom τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God οὐκ <WG3756> ouk did not ἔγνω <WG1097> egnō know ὁ <WG3588> ho the κόσμος <WG2889> kosmos world διὰ <WG1223> dia through τῆς <WG3588> tēs [its] σοφίας <WG4678> sophias wisdom τὸν <WG3588> ton - Θεόν <WG2316> Theon [Him] , εὐδόκησεν <WG2106> eudokēsen was pleased ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεὸς <WG2316> Theos God διὰ <WG1223> dia through τῆς <WG3588> tēs the μωρίας <WG3472> mōrias foolishness τοῦ <WG3588> tou of what κηρύγματος <WG2782> kērygmatos was preached σῶσαι <WG4982> sōsai to save τοὺς <WG3588> tous those who πιστεύοντας <WG4100> pisteuontas believe .

Ἐπειδὴ <WG1894> Epeidē - καὶ <WG2532> kai - Ἰουδαῖοι <WG2453> Ioudaioi Jews σημεῖα <WG4592> sēmeia signs αἰτοῦσιν <WG154> aitousin demand καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἕλληνες <WG1672> Hellēnes Greeks σοφίαν <WG4678> sophian wisdom , ζητοῦσιν <WG2212> zētousin search for

ἡμεῖς <WG1473> hēmeis we δὲ <WG1161> de but κηρύσσομεν <WG2784> kēryssomen preach Χριστὸν <WG5547> Christon Christ ἐσταυρωμένον <WG4717> estaurōmenon crucified , Ἰουδαίοις <WG2453> Ioudaiois to Jews μὲν <WG3303> men - σκάνδαλον <WG4625> skandalon a stumbling block ἔθνεσιν <WG1484> ethnesin to Gentiles , ( BYZ and TR to Greeks) δὲ <WG1161> de and μωρίαν <WG3472> mōrian foolishness

αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to those δὲ <WG1161> de but τοῖς <WG3588> tois who κλητοῖς <WG2822> klētois are called , Ἰουδαίοις <WG2453> Ioudaiois Jews τε <WG5037> te both καὶ <WG2532> kai and Ἕλλησιν <WG1672> Hellēsin Greeks , Χριστὸν <WG5547> Christon Christ Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God δύναμιν <WG1411> dynamin [the] power καὶ <WG2532> kai and Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God . σοφίαν <WG4678> sophian [the] wisdom

Ὅτι <WG3754> Hoti For τὸ <WG3588> to the μωρὸν <WG3474> mōron foolishness τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God σοφώτερον <WG4680> sophōteron wiser τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn than man’s [wisdom] , ( Literally than men; twice in this verse) ἐστίν <WG1510> estin is καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸ <WG3588> to the ἀσθενὲς <WG772> asthenes weakness τοῦ <WG3588> tou - Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou of God ἰσχυρότερον <WG2478> ischyroteron [is] stronger τῶν <WG3588> tōn - ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn than man’s [strength] .

Βλέπετε <WG991> Blepete consider ( Wisdom from God) γὰρ <WG1063> gar - τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κλῆσιν <WG2821> klēsin calling : ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn [ the time of ] your ἀδελφοί <WG80> adelphoi Brothers , ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - οὐ <WG3756> ou Not πολλοὶ <WG4183> polloi many [of you] σοφοὶ <WG4680> sophoi [were] wise κατὰ <WG2596> kata by human standards σάρκα <WG4561> sarka . . . ; οὐ <WG3756> ou not πολλοὶ <WG4183> polloi many [were] δυνατοί <WG1415> dynatoi powerful ; οὐ <WG3756> ou not πολλοὶ <WG4183> polloi many [were] εὐγενεῖς <WG2104> eugeneis of noble birth .

ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla But τὰ <WG3588> ta the μωρὰ <WG3474> mōra foolish things τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world ἐξελέξατο <WG1586> exelexato chose ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεός <WG2316> Theos God ἵνα <WG2443> hina to καταισχύνῃ <WG2617> kataischynē shame τοὺς <WG3588> tous the σοφούς <WG4680> sophous wise ; καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἀσθενῆ <WG772> asthenē weak things τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world ἐξελέξατο <WG1586> exelexato chose ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεός <WG2316> Theos God ἵνα <WG2443> hina to καταισχύνῃ <WG2617> kataischynē shame τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἰσχυρά <WG2478> ischyra strong .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὰ <WG3588> ta the ἀγενῆ <WG36> agenē lowly τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the κόσμου <WG2889> kosmou world , καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta things ἐξουθενημένα <WG1848> exouthenēmena despised ἐξελέξατο <WG1586> exelexato chose ὁ <WG3588> ho - Θεός <WG2316> Theos [He] (καὶ) <WG2532> kai and τὰ <WG3588> ta the things that μὴ <WG3361> mē not , ὄντα <WG1510> onta are ἵνα <WG2443> hina to τὰ <WG3588> ta the things that ὄντα <WG1510> onta are , καταργήσῃ <WG2673> katargēsē nullify

ὅπως <WG3704> hopōs so that μὴ <WG3361> mē no καυχήσηται <WG2744> kauchēsētai may boast πᾶσα <WG3956> pasa vvv σὰρξ <WG4561> sarx [one] ἐνώπιον <WG1799> enōpion in [His] presence τοῦ <WG3588> tou . . . Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou . . . .

Ἐξ <WG1537> Ex because of αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou Him [that] δὲ <WG1161> de [It is] ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you ἐστε <WG1510> este are ἐν <WG1722> en in Χριστῷ <WG5547> Christō Christ Ἰησοῦ <WG2424> Iēsou Jesus , ὃς <WG3739> hos who ἐγενήθη <WG1096> egenēthē has become σοφία <WG4678> sophia wisdom ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin for us ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Θεοῦ <WG2316> Theou God : δικαιοσύνη <WG1343> dikaiosynē [our] righteousness , τε <WG5037> te - καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἁγιασμὸς <WG38> hagiasmos holiness , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀπολύτρωσις <WG629> apolytrōsis redemption .

ἵνα <WG2443> hina Therefore , καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as γέγραπται <WG1125> gegraptai it is written : Ὁ <WG3588> Ho “ Let him who καυχώμενος <WG2744> kauchōmenos boasts ἐν <WG1722> en in Κυρίῳ <WG2962> Kyriō [the] Lord .” ( ) καυχάσθω <WG2744> kauchasthō boast
